title: The Hunt For Beyonc√©'s Secret Snapchat Account Presses On As The Singer Breaks Instagram Silence To Post Up With Blue!
text:
Oh hay, little deer!
Unbothered by that Coachella cancellation , Beyonc√© decided to break her three week Instagram silence with a new pic uploaded Thursday afternoon!
Related: Twitter Reacts To Beyonc√© Dropping Out Of Coachella! 
Posted up as a pair of baby deer, Bey and Blue Ivy Carter look happy at what looks to be last weekend's NBA All-Star Game!
She simply captioned the image:
"üíï"
This is great and all, but you only have access to this adorable filter if you have a Snapchat account.
Therefore ‚Äî Does Bey have a secret account? Will she ever make it public? Would you want to see her day-to-day as bad as we do? OH GAWD. CAN'T HANDLE THIS.
